author: norman
msg: Use BeanFactoryBeanProcessors to load instances and parse configs. This includes implementations for UsersStore, VirtualTableStore und ProtocolHandlerChain. See same should get done for Loading Mailets and for MailStore. This is the first step to remove the LoaderService (JAMES-966)

author: stylesen
msg: Point to s.a.o website instead of s.t.o.

author: markt
msg: If the ThreadLocal is set to null, there won't be a memory leak but GC is required to clean up the keys. Continue to remove the keys if found to reduce the volume of data that has to be looked at when tracing memory leaks.

author: jacopoc
msg: Automated test for the creation of a production run.
